message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $10,000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $9,000 is a little lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to come down to $9,500. This is a great deal for both of us, and it's the best I can do right now.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,200? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
